description: The mansion of Iceburg, mayor of Water 7 and president of Galley-La Company. This is where the CP9 agents confront Iceburg and reveal their true identities while demanding the Pluton blueprints.

keyEvents.title: Iceburg Confronts Robin About Poneglyphs
keyEvents.description: Inside his mansion, Iceburg confronts Nico Robin about her ability to read the ancient Poneglyphs.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the central conflict around Robin's dangerous knowledge.

keyEvents.title: Iceburg Reveals He Has Pluton Blueprints
keyEvents.description: Iceburg reveals to Robin that he possesses the blueprints for Pluton inside his mansion.
keyEvents.significance: Major world-building reveal explaining why CP9 targeted Iceburg.

keyEvents.title: Rob Lucci's True Identity Revealed
keyEvents.description: Inside Iceburg's mansion, the bull-masked agent removes his mask to reveal himself as Rob Lucci.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most shocking reveals in One Piece occurs in this location.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Confront Galley-La Shipwrights
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat crew reaches the back garden of Iceburg's mansion where they are forced to fight against the Galley-La shipwrights.
keyEvents.significance: Creates chaotic situation where the Straw Hats must fight people who should be their allies.

statusHistory.reason: Mansion is the location of the CP9 reveal and confrontation

description: The headquarters of the Galley-La Company, the premier shipbuilding company in Water 7. In this episode, the company's headquarters becomes a battlefield as masked CP9 agents attack the shipwrights.

keyEvents.title: Paulie Reveals Fake Blueprints
keyEvents.description: At the Galley-La Company, wounded Paulie reveals that the blueprints he was carrying are fakes.
keyEvents.significance: Shows that Iceburg and the foremen were prepared for the CP9 attack.

keyEvents.title: Blueno Demonstrates Tekkai
keyEvents.description: At Galley-La Company, the bear-masked agent uses Tekkai to block Tilestone's attack.
keyEvents.significance: First demonstration of Rokushiki techniques at the company headquarters.

statusHistory.reason: Location where Galley-La foremen confront the CP9 agents

description: A major water city in Paradise known for its excellent shipwrights and unique waterway-based architecture. The city becomes the stage for the shocking CP9 reveal and the beginning of a major conflict in the One Piece story.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Gets Stuck Between Buildings
keyEvents.description: In Water 7's unique architecture, Luffy gets stuck between buildings while trying to reach Iceburg's mansion.
keyEvents.significance: Provides comic relief and showcases the city's distinctive layout.

statusHistory.reason: The city is the main setting for the Water 7 arc
